segments.text: Excuse me , what's the screen near your steering wheel for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a portable TV . It's a popular thing now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's new to me . So what's on everyday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: News about current affairs , documentaries , music , movies , noncommercial ads and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there are something good and informative . I think that many people underestimate the value of TV in education .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree . Are there any commercials on the TV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Because the TV stations need to make money from commercials between the programs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That makes a lot of sense . Does the TV work well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not always . It depends on the transmission of the satellite signals .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got it . Do you pay for the programs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a little bit expensive , but it's worth it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . You know driving is boring . TV can get me out of the fatigue of driving .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It can also entertain your passengers like me .
segments.speaker: S1
